name: Accountancy, Business & Mngt. (ABM) 2 - QuexBook
description: QuexBook is a mobile learning module patterned on the Department of Educations K12 Curriculum Guide (DepEd K to 12 CG) designed to enhance and strengthened knowledge about various subjects in Junior High and Senior High Subjects.  ABM 2 is composed of almost 690 questions with solutions and is equivalent to 900-page Book.  It contains the following topics:   I. Statement of Financial Position II. Statement of Comprehensive Income III. Statement of Changes in Equity  IV. Cash Flow Statement  V. Analysis and Interpretation of Financial Statements  VI. Accounting Books- Journal and ledger VII. Basic Documents and Transactions related to Bank Deposits  VIII. Bank Reconciliation Statement IX. Accounting Practice  X.Income and Bussiness Taxation
